Description: This template creates a Project Service Account Secret for an existing MongoDB Atlas Project Service Account. Secrets provide credentials for programmatic access.

ProjectId.Description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies the project.

ClientId.Description: The Client ID of an existing Project Service Account. Get this from the MongoDB Atlas UI or from a previously created Project Service Account.

SecretExpiresAfterHours.Description: Expiration time of the new Service Account secret in hours. The minimum and maximum allowed expiration times are subject to change and are controlled by the organization's settings.

Profile.Description: Secret Manager Profile that contains the Atlas Programmatic keys

SecretId.Description: The ID of the created secret

SecretCreatedAt.Description: Date and time that the secret was created

SecretExpiresAt.Description: Date and time that the secret expires
